sentences.en: Burgundy has always been considered a major centre of gastronomy.
sentences.cn: 勃艮第大区一向被视为重要的美食中心。

sentences.en: Followed by nature attractions, panoramic viewpoints and gastronomy.
sentences.cn: 根据自然吸引 、 全景的观点和美食法跟随.

sentences.en: Gastronomy : Art of selecting, preparing, serving, and enjoying fine food.
sentences.cn: 烹调法: 烹调法是对食物选择 、 烹饪 、 供应和享受的艺术.

sentences.en: Gastronomy : ideal to be served with all kind of meat, pastas and food with spicy sauce.
sentences.cn: 配搭: 适合与各类肉类, 鹅鸭肉和带有香料的香肠搭配.

sentences.en: How are our wines and Mediterranean gastronomy combined harmoniously?
sentences.cn: 如何和谐地搭配法国南部酒与地中海佳肴?

sentences.en: In Washington, haute gastronomy is at least as important as the national economy ( Ann L. Trebbe )
sentences.cn: 在华盛顿, 精美烹调技术至少和国民经济一样重要 ( 安L. 特雷比 )

sentences.en: Log cabin , Gastronomy and Steak house belong to our portfolio . For more information please call us.
sentences.cn: 提供关于板块房屋的信息,请您拨打010-80262089, 电话垂询.

words.tran_cn: 爱吃的人；美食家；讲究饮食的人
烹饪法，[食品]美食法；享乐主义

trans.tran_en: the art and science of cooking and eating good food
